use_cases.title: AI Personalized Wedding Invitations
pain_points: Manually typing 200+ guest names into design templates
Layouts breaking when names are too long
Generic designs that lack a personal touch
use_cases.solution_summary: InviteFlow.ai uses context-aware AI to extract wedding details and bulk-render hundreds of personalized, black-tie or casual wedding invites in seconds. No more drag-and-drop struggle.

faq.question: Can I use my own guest list?
faq.answer: Yes, simply upload a CSV file and InviteFlow.ai will generate a unique, personalized invitation for every guest.

faq.question: Are the designs high resolution?
faq.answer: Yes, all invitations are rendered in vector-quality PNGs, perfect for sharing via WhatsApp, Email, or printing.

use_cases.title: Automated Corporate Event Invitations
pain_points: HR teams wasting hours on manual invitation design
Inconsistent branding across large guest lists
use_cases.solution_summary: Professional, on-brand event invitations generated from a single text prompt. Perfect for town halls, holiday parties, and networking mixers.

faq.question: Is InviteFlow.ai secure for company data?
faq.answer: We prioritize data privacy. Your guest lists are used strictly for rendering and are never shared with third parties.

use_cases.title: Cyberpunk & Tech Launch Invitations
pain_points: Generic templates don't fit the 'tech' or 'dev' vibe
Need for rapid iteration on launch details
Difficulty reaching developers with standard formats
use_cases.solution_summary: Our 'Neon' and 'Retrowave' themes are built for tech teams. Just paste your launch notes and get 1,000 unique, system-themed invites.

competitors.name: Canva
comparison_points: Canva requires manual drag-and-drop for every guest; InviteFlow.ai is 100% automated.
Canva layouts are static; InviteFlow.ai layouts are code-first and auto-resize for any name length.
InviteFlow.ai renders 500 invites in 30 seconds, a task that takes hours in Canva.

competitors.name: Paperless Post
comparison_points: InviteFlow.ai offers deeper personalization beyond just 'name' fields.
InviteFlow.ai allows full export of PNGs for total distribution freedom.
Our AI extracts event details directly from your existing Slack or Email messages.

features.title: AI-Driven Personalization Engine
features.description: Our LLM-based engine analyzes your event text to infer tone, style, and essential logistics automatically.

features.title: High-Speed Bulk Rendering
features.description: Leverage a cluster of headless browsers to generate hundreds of invitations simultaneously without quality loss.
